action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hello,


We have some more exports with 'comma' issues. They are in different fields to last time.


Is there a way to delete any commas from the files when exporting?? As it is preventing the automation of orders into pronto.


Thanks,
Rosemary


RosemaryMurphy
Marketing Communications Manager


rmurphy@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

+61 400 329 380

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

We pride ourselves on the highest levels of service delivery, please feel free to contact me on any of the above methods, anytime.

From: Alma Oribello <aoribello@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 6 July 2022 3:15 PM
To: Rosemary Murphy <RMurphy@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: RE: eCommerce order files with 'commas'


Hi Rosemary,

I've had a couple orders again not transferring through to Pronto. What I did was remove the commas and the following orders got auto loaded in Pronto the following day.
Can you please follow up with developer to find a way to not allow 'commas' on the export files.

PO ref 18632:


PO ref 9555:


Thanks
AlmaOribello
IT Coordinator


aoribello@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

4 Secombe Place Moorebank 2170 NSW

0415 665 568

Customer Service: 1300 360 211

We pride ourselves on the highest levels of service delivery, please feel free to contact me on any of the above methods, anytime.

Any unauthorised review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.

From: Alma Oribello
Sent: Friday, 17 June 2022 3:37 PM
To: Rosemary Murphy <RMurphy@mayohardware.com.au>; Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: RE: THERMACELL PO 9430


Thanks Rosemary!
I believe any commas (,) anywhere in the file creates issues with the auto load so best to not have any commas at all.

Regards
AlmaOribello
IT Coordinator


aoribello@mayohardware.com.au

www.mayohardware.com.au

Noted the below, will ask the developer to now look at this field. As last time it was the address field!


Thanks,
Rosemary

From: Alma Oribello <aoribello@mayohardware.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 17 June 2022 3:14 PM
To: Rosemary Murphy <RMurphy@mayohardware.com.au>; Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: FW: THERMACELL PO 9430


Hi Rosemary,
We have another order, Thermacell this time, that didn't get auto loaded in Pronto. This was again caused by a comma (,) in column BD. Can we please pass this on to the developer and emphasize not to have any commas in the files.
We are almost getting there. Hopefully all issues will be addressed.

Hi Leah,
I have manually entered the order in Pronto.



Thanks
AlmaOribello
IT Coordinator

From: Alma Oribello
Sent: Tuesday, 14 June 2022 9:23 AM
To: Leah Mills <LMills@mayohardware.com.au>; Rosemary Murphy <RMurphy@mayohardware.com.au>
Cc: Anne-Marie Van Gestel <avangestel@mayohardware.com.au>; Margaret Renton <mrenton@mayohardware.com.au>
Subject: eCommerce order


Hi Leah,
Attached order didn't come through in Pronto. Please process manually.

Hi Rosemary,
We've had some issues wherein some of the orders didn't get auto loaded in Pronto. I have raised this with Manish our Pronto consultant and he's indicated that the reason for it is having commas (,) on any of the fields. We can not have comma in the text in a CSV ( comma separated file). Can you please advise web developer that we not accept commas in any of the fields on the web portal when customers are placing orders.

Thanks
AlmaOribello
IT Coordinator


aoribello@mayohardware.com.au
